entry.title: GuilloryCraft/ExtraCredit
entry.summary:
A small-scale vanilla-style content mod for Balatro University!

entry.title: Firch/Bunco
entry.summary:
Bunco is a vanilla-style Balatro content mod

A mod that aims to add more content in a way that'd seamlessly exist within the vanilla Balatro!
